name: Storm Brew
description:
Storm Brew is a game made by our team CodePanda during the gamejam: Pixel Challenge 2018; in Quebec City.

The theme for the inspiration of the game behind it was: The Perfect Storm.

We were a team of 6 ; 2 artist, 1 integratist and 3 programmer.

We had only 48 hours to publish the game, we are so proud of it that maybe we'll work a little harder to make it publishable.
